attributes.action: Raise awarness of flat head syndrome (PLAGIOCEPHALY) to new parents!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: i think it is extremely important to raise the awareness of this condition to all parents when their baby is born. The number of these cases is rising dramatically and we need to do something about it! Surely its better to prevent a baby from getting it rather than having to treat which is much harder! It would only take a leaflet provided by midwifes etc but then parents are aware. There are so many parents out there that are having to try and deal with their babies having this condtion!!

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Raise awarness of flat head syndrome (PLAGIOCEPHALY) to new parents!"

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page18230


Prime Minister's Office
